description.value: Omni-Tek is synonymous with advanced technology, structured organization, and corporate might. Characters associated with Omni-Tek benefit from advanced resources and operate within a system of corporate power and efficiency.

life_path.name: Omni-Pol Officer
life_path.description: As a member of Omni-Tek's corporate police force, you uphold the law within corporate territories, balancing combat skills with law enforcement strategies.
life_path.equipment: Omni-Pol armor, standard-issue firearm, enforcement badge, secured communicator.

life_path.name: Omni-AF (Armed Forces) Trooper
life_path.description: Serving in Omni-Tek's military arm, you are trained for various combat scenarios, from defending corporate assets to engaging in offensive operations.
life_path.equipment: Military-grade armor, Omni-AF issued rifle, tactical gear, communication headset.

life_path.name: Omni-Admin
life_path.description: As a vital part of Omni-Tek's administrative division, you manage key corporate operations, from logistics to personnel, ensuring the smooth running of the corporate machine.
life_path.equipment: Business attire, high-security data pad, Omni-Admin access card, corporate vehicle access.

life_path.name: Omni-Med Technician
life_path.description: In the forefront of medical innovation, you work on advanced healthcare solutions, contributing to both field medicine and groundbreaking medical research.
life_path.equipment: Omni-Med kit, laboratory coat, medical scanning devices, secure medical database access.

life_path.name: Omni-Mining Foreman
life_path.description: Working in the resource extraction division, you are involved in mining operations, from planetary excavation to resource processing and management.
life_path.equipment: Mining gear, resource scanning tools, heavy-duty protective suit, Omni-Mining access credentials.

life_path.name: Diplomatic Liaison
life_path.description: Bridging Omni-Tek with other factions, governments, and organizations, you are pivotal in diplomatic negotiations and strategic alliance building.
life_path.equipment: Formal diplomatic attire, secure communication device, encrypted data portfolio, Omni-Tek diplomatic ID.
